mutants.original_line: return "Error: Input is not an integer"
return "Error: Input should be greater than 0"
return "{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number".format(n, odd_or_even, "not" if is_prime == 'No' else '')
return "{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number".format(n, odd_or_even, "not" if is_prime == 'No' else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number'.format(n, odd_or_even, 'not' if is_prime != 'No' else '')

mutants.original_line: return "{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number".format(n, odd_or_even, "not" if is_prime == 'No' else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number'.format(n, odd_or_even, '' if is_prime == 'No' else '')

mutants.original_line: return "{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number".format(n, odd_or_even, "not" if is_prime == 'No' else '')
mutants.mutated_line: return '{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number'.format(n, odd_or_even, 'not' if is_prime == 'No' else 'MUTATED')

mutants.original_line: return "{0} is an {1} number and it is {2} a prime number".format(n, odd_or_even, "not" if is_prime == 'No' else '')
